header.title: Full Stack Developer
header.description: I transform ideas into innovative digital solutions

about.title: About Me
about.bio: I'm a full stack developer specialized in building high-performance web and mobile applications. My expertise spans modern frontend development, robust backends, and creating AI algorithms that integrate seamlessly into your applications. I design intelligent solutions that deploy to the cloud, scalable and secure. I transform complex ideas into impactful digital products that deliver results.
